short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you print Banner 9 Admin Pages with better results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an open-source application that redirects the Banner admin page you are currently viewing to a Bootstrap style page that allows you to disable sections and columns from printing, as well as re-order them with minimal fuss. 

Please note that this extension is only for Eastern Illinois University, it will not function properly from other instances of Banner.
